hed: 12 Movie Cliques We Want To Be A Part Of
dek: What we wouldn't give for a makeover straight from Cher Horowitz...
socialTitle: 12 Movie Cliques We Want To Be A Part Of

items.caption:
*Mean Girls*, *Heathers*, and *Clueless* all have one thing in common (other than the fact that they're legit amazing): they feature friendship cliques that have us saying "we want to go to there." No one can replace our actual BFFs, but let's be honest –– who wouldn't want to be the fourth wheel in Harry, Ron and Hermione's friend group? And don't even get us started on *Grease*’s Pink Ladies. They wear matching jackets.

Scroll through the gallery to check out *Teen Vogue*’s favorite movie cliques of all time, and then feel free to buy your friend group some matching t-shirts. Preferably ones that say "On Wednesdays We Wear Pink."

items.title: __*Mean Girls*’s Greatest People You’ll Ever Meet__
items.caption: As much as we'd love to be part of The Plastics, these it-girls weren't exactly warm and fuzzy. In fact, Regina George is straight-up terrifying. That being said, we'd love nothing more than to plot and scheme with Cady, Janis, and Damien –– and hey, we wouldn't say no to chillin' with Tina Fey, either.

items.title: __*Clueless*’s Glam Squad__
items.caption: Cher, Ty, and Dion are the ultimate clique, and we'd give anything to get in on that '90s action –– especially if we got access to Cher's closet! Plus, these ladies have PhDs in both Makeovers *and* The Art of Wearing Knee Socks, which is a definite bonus.

items.title: *__The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants__*
items.caption: All you need to know is this: these besties *literally share traveling pants*. If that isn't reason enough to join, we don't know what is. And it definitely helps that Blake Lively, Amber Tamblyn, America Ferrera, and Alexis Bledel are friends in real life! We can only assume they share a pair of traveling Louboutins.

items.title: __The *Heathers*__
items.caption: We know The Heathers are *slightly* evil (ok, more than slightly), but how cool would it to be part of this '80s mean girl group? Ultimately, we'd end up Team Veronica, but an invitation to The Heathers would be worth it for the scrunchies alone.

items.title: __Harry, Ron, and Hermione (aka House Gryffindor)__
items.caption: Do we really need to convince you how awesome this clique is? Harry, Ron, and Hermione spend their time riding dragons, drinking butterbeer, and *fighting dark lords with wands*. They're living the fab life, and we want in.

items.title: __The Pink Ladies__
items.caption: As we already mentioned, *Grease*’s Pink Ladies wear matching jackets, which is amazing. What we didn't chat about is the fact that they break into spontaneous song and dance routines for literally no reason. BRB, getting "we go together like rama lama lama ka dinga da dinga dong" temporarily tattooed on our arms.

items.title: __The Cullens__
items.caption: Bella is one lucky girl! As a mere human, her invitation to the Cullens' exclusive vampire clique was a major win: not only does this toothy family not age, they're all ridiculously good looking and they sparkle. We repeat: *they sparkle*.

items.title: __*Now and Then*’s Girl Group__
items.caption: If you haven't seen *Now and Then* (written by Marlene King from *Pretty Little Liars*!), do yourself a favor and watch it. Then feel free to revel in the friendship goodness! This classic movie will make you want to go home and hug your childhood besties, not to mention become BFFs with Thora Birch and Christina Ricci.

items.title: __The Barden Bellas__
items.caption: This clique is the *actual* best — not only do they sing a cappella in their free time (you know you love it), they always have each other's backs. Let's just say they're harmonious in more ways than one. (Sorry, total nerd moment.)

items.title: __*Whip It*’s The Hurl Scouts__
items.caption: The only thing more fun sounding than having friends who sing all day is having friends who skate all day. Plus, the name of *Whip It*’s roller derby team is The Hurl Scouts (and each member has an awesome nickname), so what's not to love?

items.title: *__The Avengers__*
items.caption: Sure, the Avengers don't always get along, but you can't get better than a clique with super powers, right? We call being Thor's best friend with the catch phrase "girl power
items.credit: Photo: Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures/courtesy Everett Collection

items.title: __The Bridesmaids from *Bridesmaids*__
items.caption: Nothing fosters friendship like being bridesmaids in the same wedding! The clique in Kristen Wiig's hit movie had a few issues (like the time they suffered the explosive consequences of bad food), but at the end of the day they totally adored each other. In short: we love them.

seoTitle: The Movie Cliques We Wish We Belonged To
seoDescription: No one can replace our actual BFFs, but let's be honest , who wouldn't want to be part of the Mean Girls or Clueless cliques?
